news_items.title: Amazon Stock Rallies On Expansion of AI Cloud Services
news_items.summary: Amazon shares rose after the company announced significant investments and new offerings in its AWS artificial intelligence cloud division, targeting enterprise customers.
news_items.effect_on_you: Amazon's continued expansion in AI and cloud reinforces its leadership position, which may be positive for long-term investors.
news_items.impact_on_asset: New investments in AI cloud services could boost AWS revenue, leading to higher growth expectations for Amazon.

news_items.title: US Markets Remain Resilient as Consumer Confidence Rises
news_items.summary: US stock markets posted modest gains as the Conference Board's Consumer Confidence Index rose for May, indicating solid consumer sentiment amid persistent inflation.
news_items.effect_on_you: Stronger consumer confidence can support market growth and buoy companies with large US consumer exposure.

news_items.title: Federal Reserve Indicates No Imminent Rate Cuts, Markets Stabilize
news_items.summary: The Federal Reserve signaled it will keep interest rates steady for now, stressing the need to see more data on inflation before considering cuts. Markets took the news in stride.
news_items.effect_on_you: Interest rate stability helps reduce volatility in equity and bond markets, aiding portfolio planning.

news_items.title: Tech Stocks Lead Gains as Nasdaq Hits New Highs
news_items.summary: Major tech stocks, including Amazon, led a rally that lifted the Nasdaq Composite Index to a new record on Tuesday, driven by strong earnings and optimism about AI.
news_items.effect_on_you: A rising tech sector can offer growth opportunities for investors with exposure to large technology firms.
news_items.impact_on_asset: Amazon's strong performance contributed to the Nasdaq's rise, reflecting positive market sentiment toward its growth prospects.

news_items.title: Eurozone Economic Growth Picks Up in Q2
news_items.summary: Preliminary data suggest the Eurozone economy expanded at a faster pace in the second quarter of 2025, supported by stronger manufacturing and consumer spending.
news_items.effect_on_you: Improving European growth can benefit multinational companies and global portfolios.

news_items.title: Oil Prices Edge Higher as Supply Concerns Persist
news_items.summary: Oil prices rose slightly due to ongoing supply disruptions in key producing countries and steady demand forecasts for summer 2025.
news_items.effect_on_you: Higher oil prices may impact inflation and costs for energy-dependent companies.
